short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays random Bible verses about the Sabbath

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sabbath Bible Verse Generator is a Free tool that displays random bible verses about the Sabbath. 

The verses are taken from King James Bible Version. It displays both from the Old Testament and New Testament Sabbath Bible verses.

When you want to explore random verses about the Sabbath from the Holy Scriptures, use this app to generate them. 

If you find it hard to find Sabbath verses on your Bible, you can use this tool to speed up the process.
